params.buyers: the array of addresses of the users on behalf of whom rBTC is going to be bought
params.purchaseAmounts: the purchase amount that corresponds to each user's purchase
params.purchasePeriods: the purchase period that corresponds to each user's purchase
params.scheduleIndexes: the indexes of the DCA schedules that correspond to each user's purchase
params.token: the stablecoin that all users in the array will spend to purchase rBTC

params.depositAmount: : the amount of stablecoin to deposit
params.purchaseAmount: : the amount of stablecoin to swap periodically for rBTC
params.purchasePeriod: : the time (in seconds) between rBTC purchases for each user
params.token: : the token address of stablecoin to deposit

deleteDcaSchedule(address,uint256).details: function to delete a DCA schedule: cancels DCA and retrieves the funds

params.token: the token used for DCA in the schedule to be deleted

params.depositAmount: : the amount of DOC to deposit

getMinPurchasePeriod().details: returns the minimum period that can be set for purchases

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.adminOperationsAddress: : the address of token handler factory

params.purchaseAmount: : the amount of DOC to swap periodically for rBTC

params.purchasePeriod: : the time (in seconds) between rBTC purchases for each user

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params.depositAmount: : the amount of stablecoin to add to the existing schedule (final token balance for the schedule is the previous balance + depositAmount)
params.purchaseAmount: : the amount of stablecoin to swap periodically for rBTC
params.purchasePeriod: : the time (in seconds) between rBTC purchases for each user
params.scheduleIndex: : the index of the schedule to create or update
params.token: : the token address of stablecoin to deposit

withdrawInterestFromTokenHandler(address.details: Users can withdraw the stablecoin interests accrued by the deposits they made

params.token: The address of the token to withdraw
The token address of the stablecoin

batchBuyRbtc(address[],address,uint256[].notice: a buyer may be featured more than once in the buyers array if two or more their schedules are due for a purchasewe need to take extra care in the back end to not mismatch a user's address with a wrong DCA schedule

constructor.notice: the contract is ownable and after deployment its ownership shall be transferred to the wallet associated to the CRON jobthe DCA contract inherits from OZ's Ownable, which is the secure, standard way to handle ownership

createDcaSchedule(address,uint256,uint25.notice: deposit the full stablecoin amount for DCA on the contract, set the period and the amount for purchases

depositToken(address,uint256,uint256).notice: deposit the full DOC amount for DCA on the contract

modifyMinPurchasePeriod(uint256).notice: modify the minimum period between purchases

setAdminOperations(address).notice: update the token handler factory contract

setPurchaseAmount(address,uint256,uint25.notice: the amount cannot be greater than or equal to half of the deposited amount

updateDcaSchedule(address,uint256,uint25.notice: deposit the full stablecoin amount for DCA on the contract, set the period and the amount for purchases

withdrawAllAccmulatedRbtc().notice: Withdraw all of the rBTC accumulated by a user through their various DCA strategies

withdrawRbtcFromTokenHandler(address).notice: Users can withdraw the rBtc accumulated through all the DCA strategies created using a given stablecoin

withdrawToken(address,uint256,uint256).notice: withdraw amount for DCA on the contract
